#EXTM3U
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=8001566,RESOLUTION=1920x1080,FRAME-RATE=30.000,CODECS="avc1.640028,mp4a.40.2"
source/video.m3u8
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=2000000,RESOLUTION=1280x720,FRAME-RATE=30.000,CODECS="avc1.64001F,mp4a.40.2"
720p/video.m3u8
#EXT-X-STREAM-INF:BANDWIDTH=500000,RESOLUTION=640x360,FRAME-RATE=30.000,CODECS="avc1.64001E,mp4a.40.2"
360p/video.m3u8
